title: 3:AM Magazine

title: DIGICULT | Digital Art, Design and Culture
description: Since 2005, Digicult is a platform that critically examines the impact of digital technologies and science on art, design, culture and contemporary society.

title: Flow

title: Quote Investigator® – Tracing Quotations
description: Records the investigatory work of Garson O’Toole who diligently seeks the truth about quotations. Who really said what?

title: We Are the Mutants
description: An online magazine focusing on Cold War-era sci-fi, fantasy, genre, pulp, cult, occult, and anti-establishment media.
